events.title: Wildlife Safari
events.description: Embark on an exciting wildlife safari and observe various exotic animals up close.

events.title: Penguin Encounter
events.description: Get up close and personal with adorable penguins in this interactive encounter.

events.title: Jungle Night
events.description: Explore the zoo at night and witness nocturnal animals in their natural habitat.

events.title: Zoo Photography Workshop
events.description: Enhance your photography skills in this hands-on workshop.

events.title: Sloth Appreciation Day
events.description: Enjoy sloth-themed activities, learn fascinating facts, and meet sloths up close!
